metadata.title: RONFEN NP-FZ100 Dummy Battery DC Coupler USB-C Cable PD Adapter Kit Replace AC-FZ100 AC Power Adapter for Cameras Sony Alpha 9 A9 II A9R A9S A7 III A7R III A7S III A6600 A7IV A7 IV A7R IV A7C A1 FX3
features: 【Compatible Models】RONFEN NP-FZ100 NPFZ100 DC coupler dummy battery USB-C cable PD adapter kit is compatible with cameras Sony Alpha A7 III A7III 7 III 7M3 A7M3 A7R III A7RIII A7R3 7R III A7S III A7S3 7S III A7 IV A7IV 7 IV 7M4 A7M4 A7RIV A7R4 7R IV 7RM4 A7C 7C Alpha 9 A9 A9R 9R A9S 9S A9 II A9II 9 II 9M2 A6600 FX3 Alpha 1 A1. Suitable for most 7.2V-8.4V and 9V cameras. ★portable design for travel. This NP-FZ100 dummy battery USB-C adapter kit is much smaller and lighter than AC-FZ100 adapter.

【Functions】NP-FZ100 NPFZ100 DC coupler dummy battery USB-C cable kit connects to an PD quick charger / adapter to power your camera from an AC outlet. Useful for lengthy studio shoots with no need to continuously replace and recharge multiple batteries. It can also be an outdoor accessory specially developed for Sony enthusiasts when it is connected to power bank supply, to provide uninterrupted power for your camera. Replace carrying multiple NP-FZ100 batteries.

【Specifications】USB-C Input: 30W or above, Compatible with 18W 30W 45W 60W 65W PD Chargers, DC Output: 7.2~9.0V, 2~3A, Extra Long 1.2M Adapter AC/DC Coupler cords. External Power Supply: Power Delivery USB Type C Wall chargers / adapters, portable PD power banks, PD car chargers. Type-c power delivery port output requirements: 9V 2A, 3A is better, DC to DC Output: 7.2V~8.4V (The current output size depends on your camera lenses and shoe-mount flashes.) This product is CE FCC and ROHS certified.

【ADVANTAGES】★RONFEN PD-BX Convertor has power status indicator and integrates 2 chips, one to identify PD and QC3.0/4.0 power, the other for 9V-24V wide voltage input. After the step-down treatment, the regulated output has overvoltage, overheat and short circuit protection functions.★The USB-C input PD power mode will get more power than USB Type-A power supply. Compared to the AC-FZ100 ac power adapter kit, the DC drive cable serves to effectively suppress harmonic current noise (buzzing/hum)

【IMPORTANT】The power of the PD charger/adapter must be between 18W~65W. Only support 18W 30W 45W 60W 65W PD Wall charger / PD mobile power supply / PD Car charger, do not use other devices, otherwise the camera will be damaged. This device is only used to power the camera, Do not connect other devices at the same time, Otherwise it will cause insufficient power supply. Not workable with LAPTOP TYPE C Output. Certain cameras may consume higher current, please use a high-performance power supply.
description: RONFEN NP-FZ100 Dummy Battery USB Type-C Cable PD Adapter Kit Replace AC-FZ100 AC Power Adapter
This kit can continuously power the camera to shoot video, live webcast, or record the growth of plants etc. You no longer need to worry about running out of the battery.

indoor and outdoor shooting, such as: studio, home, mountaineering, camping, etc. With camera as webcam for video conferences, long-term recording of Youtube, Tiktok, Vlog, Ins, Facebook videos, added time-lapse feature to your life!

Alpha A7 III A7III A73 (Alpha 7 III ILCE-7M3 ILCE-7M3K A7M3 α7 III) Alpha A7R III A7RIII A7R3 (Alpha 7R III ILCE-7RM3 A7RM3 α7R III) Alpha A7S III A7SIII A7S3 (Alpha 7S III ILCE-7SM3 A7SM3 α7S III) Alpha A7 IV A7IV A74 A7 Mark IV (Alpha 7 IV ILCE-7M4 A7M4 α7 IV) Alpha A7R IV A7RIV A7R4 (Alpha 7R IV ILCE-7RM4 A7RM4 α7R IV) Alpha A7C (Alpha 7C, ILCE-7C/B) Alpha A9 (Alpha 9, ILCE-9, α9) Alpha A9R (Alpha 9R ILCE-9R) Alpha A9S (Alpha 9S ILCE-9S) Alpha A9 II A9II A92 (Alpha 9 II ILCE-9M2 A9M2 α9 II) Alpha A6600 (ILCE-6600 ILCE-6600M A6600 α6600) Alpha FX3 (ILME-FX3) Alpha 1 (ILCE-1 A1 α1).
1 x USB Type-C cable with PD-BX convertor (L:1.2M)1 x NP-FZ100 DC Coupler dummy battery1 x PD 30W adapter
★ Install the DC coupler into the battery cavity, route the cable through the slot, fully close the cavity door.
(key step if you leave the cavity lid open camera may can't start)

★ When the camera can’t work normally, please choose a power adapter with at least 3A.★ Some chargers are equipped with identification components, which can’t identify the camera, so it is not recommended.
1. 12-months warranty2. Easy-to-Reach Support: online customer service provided if any query. Do not hesitate to contact us.
